tweet: Thanks @michaelcburgess, @RogerMarshallMD, @RepBradWenstrup, @DrNealDunnFL2, @RepBuddyCarter and @RepArrington for coming with me to a medical focused visit to Rio Grande Valley Sector. It was a pleasure to lead members of the GOP Doctors Caucus down to our southern border to put our eyes on the situation. We have great @DHSgov    personnel working hard to address this humanitarian crisis. You deserve much thanks and Congress’s support. pic.twitter.com/8ubrTAqpav

The GI Bill changed my life & many other servicemembers lives forever. It gave me the opportunity to get the education I needed to build a career in medicine and support my family. Let’s recognize June 16 - 23, 2019 as National GI Bill Commemoration Week. https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/opinion/op-eds/rep-phil-roe-how-the-gi-bill-has-changed-lives-for-75-years …

The bald eagle is an inspiring symbol of the spirit of freedom and the democracy of the United States. Thank you to the American Eagle Foundation for founding this day to celebrate the bald eagle’s recovery from extinction. #americaneagleday

Great news for our #BlueWater Vets! The Blue Water Navy Act just passed the Senate!
